MY_INVENTORY.TITLE: My Inventory
MY_INVENTORY.DESCRIPTION: This is your inventory. Here you can see all the items you have collected.

CHESTS.TITLE: Chests
CHESTS.DESCRIPTION: These are the chests you have collected. You can open them to get the items inside.

CARDS.TITLE: Cards
CARDS.DESCRIPTION: These are the cards you have collected. You can view them to see the information about the item.
